title: Recycling Programs
drescaption: Implement comprehensive recycling programs to process materials like paper, plastic, glass, and metal into new products.

title: Composting
drescaption: Convert organic waste, such as food scraps and yard waste, into nutrient-rich compost.

title: Electronic Waste (E-Waste) Recycling
drescaption: Properly recycle and dispose of electronic waste to recover valuable metals and reduce environmental impact.

title: Biodegradable Plastics
drescaption: Invest in and use biodegradable plastics made from organic materials that break down more easily than traditional plastics.

title: Energy Generation from Waste
drescaption: Utilize waste-to-energy technologies to convert organic waste into biogas, biofuels, or electricity.

title: Waste-to-Resource Conversion
drescaption: Explore technologies that convert specific waste materials into valuable resources, such as converting plastic waste into fuel or construction materials.
